kukumbukira mwachisawawa: Kukumbukira kosasinthika komwe mapulogalamu ndi data zimasungidwa
hard disk drive: Chipangizo chosungira chachikulu chosasinthika chogwiritsa ntchito maginito mbale
solid state drive: Kusungirako kosasunthika pogwiritsa ntchito flash memory, mwachangu kuposa ma HDD
basi: Njira yoti deta iyende pakati pa zigawo
chipangizo cholowetsa: Imalola kulowa kwa data pakompyuta (monga kiyibodi, mbewa)
chipangizo chotulutsa: Imapereka zotsatira kwa wogwiritsa ntchito (monga monitor, printer)
bolodi: Gulu lalikulu ladera lomwe limalumikiza zigawo zonse zamakompyuta
kompyuta network: Gulu la zida zolumikizidwa zomwe zimatha kugawana zinthu
ip adilesi: Chizindikiritso cha manambala chapadera choperekedwa ku chipangizo chilichonse pa netiweki
bandwidth: Kuchuluka kwa kuchuluka kwa kusamutsa deta kudutsa njira ya netiweki
kuchedwa: Kuchedwa kwa nthawi yoti data iyende kuchokera kochokera kupita komwe ikupita
